ROOT.GetDccCapacity: SELECT '0021990100' AS DCC_ID,SUM(S.CAPACITY)/10 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_S S JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_B P ON S.ID=P.ID WHERE P.PLANT_TYPE=1002 AND P.OPERATE_STATE=1003 AND P.DCC_ID='0021990100' AND S.VOLTAGE_TYPE=9999 AND S.STATE_CODE=1003 AND S.CAPACITY IS NOT NULL union all select a,sum(generator_capacity)/10 from ( SELECT substr(p.rel_id,0,2) as a,generator_capacity FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_rpt_gen_s_year s join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_pwrgrid_b p on s.id=p.id where generator_capacity > 0 and type=1002 and VOLTYPE IN (1001,1002,1003,1004,1005,1006,1007,1008,1009,1010,1011,1012,1013) and sta_year=2019 ) group by a
ROOT.GetDccCapacitySub: select a,sum(generator_capacity)/10 from ( SELECT substr(p.rel_id,0,4) as a,generator_capacity FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_rpt_gen_s_year s join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_pwrgrid_b p on s.id=p.id where p.rel_id like '{0}' and generator_capacity > 0 and type=1002 and VOLTYPE IN (1001,1002,1003,1004,1005,1006,1007,1008,1009,1010,1011,1012,1013) and sta_year=2019 ) group by a
ROOT.GetGridMaxPower: /*{1}*/ select dcc_id,capacity_hydro/10 + 200*day(to_date({1},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')) from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_org_dcc_s_capacity where DCC_ID IN ('0021990100'/*,'0021990101','0021990102','0021990103','0021990104','0021990105','0021990106'*/) union all select a,0.9*sum(generator_capacity)/10 + 200*day(to_date({1},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')) from ( SELECT substr(p.rel_id,0,2) as a,generator_capacity FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_rpt_gen_s_year s join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_pwrgrid_b p on s.id=p.id where generator_capacity > 0 and type=1002 and VOLTYPE IN (1001,1002,1003,1004,1005,1006,1007,1008,1009,1010,1011,1012,1013) and sta_year=2019 ) group by a
ROOT.GetDccCapacity2: SELECT P.DCC_ID,SUM(S.CAPACITY) FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_S S JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_B P ON S.ID=P.ID WHERE P.PLANT_TYPE=1002 AND P.OPERATE_STATE=1003 AND P.DCC_ID IN ('0021990100'/*,'0021990101','0021990102','0021990103','0021990104','0021990105','0021990106'*/) GROUP BY P.DCC_ID
ROOT.GetDccCapacity1: SELECT '0021990100',SUM(S.CAPACITY) FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_S S JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_B P ON S.ID=P.ID WHERE P.PLANT_TYPE=1002 AND P.OPERATE_STATE=1003 AND P.DCC_ID='0021990100' UNION ALL SELECT P.CONNECTIVE_PG_ID,SUM(S.CAPACITY) FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_S S JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_B P ON S.ID=P.ID WHERE P.PLANT_TYPE=1002 AND P.OPERATE_STATE=1003 AND P.CONNECTIVE_PG_ID IN ('0101990100','0101990101','0101990102','0101990103','0101990104','0101990105','0101990106') GROUP BY P.CONNECTIVE_PG_ID
ROOT.GetGridMaxPowerSub: SELECT ID,MAX_VALUE/10 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PWRGRID_H_STA_POW_{0} WHERE DATASOURCE_ID='0021990100' AND CREATE_DATE=TO_DATE({1},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND MEAS_TYPE='13022001' AND ID IN ({2})
ROOT.GetGridMaxPower1: SELECT ID,MAX_VALUE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PWRGRID_H_STA_POW_{0} WHERE DATASOURCE_ID='0021990100' AND CREATE_DATE=TO_DATE({1},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND MEAS_TYPE='13022001' AND ID IN ('0101990100','0101990101','0101990102','0101990103','0101990104','0101990105','0101990106')
ROOT.GetDccRunoffresv: select * from sg_con_plant_b_hydro h join SG_COM_RUNOFFRESV_B r on h.reservoir_id=r.id join sg_con_plant_b p on h.id=p.id where p.plant_type=1002 and p.dcc_id='0021990100'
ROOT.GetRunoffrecvCurve: SELECT DATE,MEAS_VALUE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_h_flood_{1} WHERE ID={0} AND DATE>={2} AND DATE<{3} AND MEAS_TYPE={4} ORDER BY DATE
ROOT.GetRunoffrecvCurveH00: SELECT DATE,ROUND(MEAS_VALUE) FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_h_flood_{1} WHERE ID={0} AND DATE>{2} AND DATE<={3} AND MEAS_TYPE={4} AND TO_CHAR(DATE,'hh24:mi')='00:00' ORDER BY DATE
ROOT.GetRunoffresvData: SELECT R.ID,R.NAME,M1.MEAS_VALUE AS M1V,M2.MEAS_VALUE AS M2V,NULL::DECIMAL AS M3V,R.M4V,R.M5V,M6.MEAS_VALUE*10000 AS M6V,M7.MEAS_VALUE*100 AS M7V,R.PLANT_ID, M8V,B.DEAD_WATER_LEVEL AS M9V,NULL::DECIMAL AS M10V,RTYPE,RID,R.river_id,river.NAME AS RIVERNAME,important FROM ( select R.ID,R.NAME,M4.MAX_VALUE/10 AS M4V,M5.TMR_GEN_VALUE/10 AS M5V,R.PLANT_ID,M5.TMR_DISC_VALUE/10 AS M8V,R.ORDERINDEX,RTYPE,RID,R.river_id,R.important from YS_DB.YSH_RUNOFFRESV_R_DCC R LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_plant_h_sta_pow_{1} M4 ON R.RID=M4.ID AND M4.MEAS_TYPE='30022001' AND M4.create_date=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND M4.DATASOURCE_ID='0021990100' LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_plant_h_sta_qua_{1} M5 ON R.RID=M5.ID AND M5.DATE=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND M5.DATASOURCE_ID='0021990100' WHERE RTYPE=1 AND R.DCC_ID = {0} UNION ALL select R.ID,R.NAME,M4.MAX_VALUE/10,M5.FORWARD_VALUE/10,R.PLANT_ID,M5.ABANDON_VALUE/10,R.ORDERINDEX,RTYPE ,RID,R.river_id,R.important from YS_DB.YSH_RUNOFFRESV_R_DCC R LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_section_h_sta_pow_{1} M4 ON R.RID=M4.ID AND M4.MEAS_TYPE='00002001' AND M4.create_date=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_section_h_sta_qua_{1} M5 ON R.RID_P=M5.ID AND M5.date=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') WHERE RTYPE=2 AND R.DCC_ID = {0} UNION ALL select R.ID,R.NAME,NULL::DECIMAL,NULL::DECIMAL,R.PLANT_ID,NULL::DECIMAL,R.orderindex,RTYPE,RID,R.river_id,R.important FROM YS_DB.YSH_RUNOFFRESV_R_DCC R WHERE RTYPE=3 AND DCC_ID = {0} ) R LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_h_flood_{1} M1 ON R.ID=M1.ID AND M1.meas_type='00001006' AND M1.DATE={3} LEFT JOIN (SELECT ID,AVG(MEAS_VALUE) AS MEAS_VALUE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_h_flood_{1} WHERE DATE>={2} AND DATE<{3} AND MEAS_TYPE='00001016' GROUP BY ID) M2 ON R.ID=M2.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_h_flood_{1} M6 ON R.ID=M6.ID AND M6.meas_type='00001022' AND M6.DATE={3} LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_h_flood_{1} M7 ON R.ID=M7.ID AND M7.meas_type='00001024' AND M7.DATE={3} LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_b B ON R.ID=B.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_river_b river ON R.river_id=river.id ORDER BY R.ORDERINDEX
ROOT.GetRunoffresvData_fzx: SELECT R.ID,R.NAME,M1.MEAS_VALUE AS M1V,M2.MEAS_VALUE AS M2V,NULL::DECIMAL AS M3V,R.M4V,R.M5V,M6.MEAS_VALUE*10000 AS M6V,M7.MEAS_VALUE*100 AS M7V,R.PLANT_ID, M8V,B.DEAD_WATER_LEVEL AS M9V,NULL::DECIMAL AS M10V,RTYPE,RID,R.river_id,river.NAME AS RIVERNAME,important FROM ( select R.ID,R.NAME,M4.MAX_VALUE/10 AS M4V,CASE R.DCC_ID WHEN '0021990100' THEN M5.TMR_GEN_VALUE/10 ELSE M5.REPORT_GRID_VALUE/10 END AS M5V,R.PLANT_ID,M5.TMR_DISC_VALUE/10 AS M8V,R.ORDERINDEX,RTYPE,RID,R.river_id,R.important from YS_DB.YSH_RUNOFFRESV_R_DCC R LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_plant_h_sta_pow_{1} M4 ON R.RID=M4.ID AND M4.MEAS_TYPE='30022001' AND M4.create_date=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND M4.DATASOURCE_ID='0021990100' LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_plant_h_sta_qua_{1} M5 ON R.RID=M5.ID AND M5.DATE=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND M5.DATASOURCE_ID='0021990100' WHERE RTYPE=1 AND fzx={0} UNION ALL select R.ID,R.NAME,M4.MAX_VALUE/10,M5.FORWARD_VALUE/10,R.PLANT_ID,M5.ABANDON_VALUE/10,R.ORDERINDEX,RTYPE ,RID,R.river_id,R.important from YS_DB.YSH_RUNOFFRESV_R_DCC R LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_section_h_sta_pow_{1} M4 ON R.RID=M4.ID AND M4.MEAS_TYPE='00002001' AND M4.create_date=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_section_h_sta_qua_{1} M5 ON R.RID_P=M5.ID AND M5.date=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') WHERE RTYPE=2 AND fzx={0} UNION ALL select R.ID,R.NAME,NULL::DECIMAL,NULL::DECIMAL,R.PLANT_ID,NULL::DECIMAL,R.orderindex,RTYPE,RID,R.river_id,R.important FROM YS_DB.YSH_RUNOFFRESV_R_DCC R WHERE RTYPE=3 AND fzx={0} ) R LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_h_flood_{1} M1 ON R.ID=M1.ID AND M1.meas_type='00001006' AND M1.DATE={3} LEFT JOIN (SELECT ID,AVG(MEAS_VALUE) AS MEAS_VALUE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_h_flood_{1} WHERE DATE>={2} AND DATE<{3} AND MEAS_TYPE='00001016' GROUP BY ID) M2 ON R.ID=M2.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_h_flood_{1} M6 ON R.ID=M6.ID AND M6.meas_type='00001022' AND M6.DATE={3} LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_h_flood_{1} M7 ON R.ID=M7.ID AND M7.meas_type='00001024' AND M7.DATE={3} LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_b B ON R.ID=B.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_river_b river ON R.river_id=river.id ORDER BY R.ORDERINDEX
ROOT.GetRunoffresvData_sheng: SELECT R.ID,R.NAME,M1.MEAS_VALUE AS M1V,M2.MEAS_VALUE AS M2V,NULL::DECIMAL AS M3V,R.M4V,R.M5V,M6.MEAS_VALUE*10000 AS M6V,M7.MEAS_VALUE*100 AS M7V,R.PLANT_ID, M8V,B.DEAD_WATER_LEVEL AS M9V,NULL::DECIMAL AS M10V,RTYPE,RID,R.river_id,river.NAME AS RIVERNAME,important FROM ( select R.ID,R.NAME,M4.MAX_VALUE/10 AS M4V,CASE R.DCC_ID WHEN '0021990100' THEN M5.TMR_GEN_VALUE/10 ELSE M5.REPORT_GRID_VALUE/10 END AS M5V,R.PLANT_ID,M5.TMR_DISC_VALUE/10 AS M8V,R.ORDERINDEX,RTYPE,RID,R.river_id,R.important from YS_DB.YSH_RUNOFFRESV_R_DCC R LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_plant_h_sta_pow_{1} M4 ON R.RID=M4.ID AND M4.MEAS_TYPE='30022001' AND M4.create_date=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND M4.DATASOURCE_ID='0021990100' LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_plant_h_sta_qua_{1} M5 ON R.RID=M5.ID AND M5.DATE=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND M5.DATASOURCE_ID='0021990100' WHERE RTYPE=1 AND province={0} UNION ALL select R.ID,R.NAME,M4.MAX_VALUE/10,M5.FORWARD_VALUE/10,R.PLANT_ID,M5.ABANDON_VALUE/10,R.ORDERINDEX,RTYPE ,RID,R.river_id,R.important from YS_DB.YSH_RUNOFFRESV_R_DCC R LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_section_h_sta_pow_{1} M4 ON R.RID=M4.ID AND M4.MEAS_TYPE='00002001' AND M4.create_date=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_section_h_sta_qua_{1} M5 ON R.RID_P=M5.ID AND M5.date=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') WHERE RTYPE=2 AND province={0} UNION ALL select R.ID,R.NAME,NULL::DECIMAL,NULL::DECIMAL,R.PLANT_ID,NULL::DECIMAL,R.orderindex,RTYPE,RID,R.river_id,R.important FROM YS_DB.YSH_RUNOFFRESV_R_DCC R WHERE RTYPE=3 AND province={0} ) R LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_h_flood_{1} M1 ON R.ID=M1.ID AND M1.meas_type='00001006' AND M1.DATE={3} LEFT JOIN (SELECT ID,AVG(MEAS_VALUE) AS MEAS_VALUE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_h_flood_{1} WHERE DATE>={2} AND DATE<{3} AND MEAS_TYPE='00001016' GROUP BY ID) M2 ON R.ID=M2.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_h_flood_{1} M6 ON R.ID=M6.ID AND M6.meas_type='00001022' AND M6.DATE={3} LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_h_flood_{1} M7 ON R.ID=M7.ID AND M7.meas_type='00001024' AND M7.DATE={3} LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_b B ON R.ID=B.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_river_b river ON R.river_id=river.id ORDER BY R.ORDERINDEX
ROOT.GetDayLoadMaxCurve_Plant: SELECT create_date,MAX_VALUE/10 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_plant_h_sta_pow_{1} WHERE ID={0} AND MEAS_TYPE='30022001' AND create_date>=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND create_date<TO_DATE({3},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND DATASOURCE_ID='0021990100'
ROOT.GetDayLoadMaxCurve_Section: SELECT create_date,MAX_VALUE/10 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_section_h_sta_pow_{1} WHERE ID={0} AND MEAS_TYPE='00002001' AND create_date>=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND create_date<TO_DATE({3},'yyyy-MM-dd')
ROOT.GetDayPowerCurve_Plant: SELECT DATE,TMR_GEN_VALUE/10 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_plant_h_sta_qua_{1} WHERE ID={0} AND date>=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND date<TO_DATE({3},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND DATASOURCE_ID='0021990100'
ROOT.GetDayPowerCurve_Section: SELECT DATE,FORWARD_VALUE/10 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_section_h_sta_qua_{1} WHERE ID={0} AND date>=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND date<TO_DATE({3},'yyyy-MM-dd')
ROOT.GetRunoffresvPjz: SELECT pjz FROM YS_DB.YSH_RUNOFFRESV_PJZ WHERE id={0} AND month={2}
ROOT.GetRunoffresvPjz1: SELECT pjz FROM YS_DB.YSH_RUNOFFRESV_R_DCC WHERE id={0}
ROOT.GetGridCapacity: SELECT id,sum(generator_capacity)/10.0 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_rpt_gen_s_year where type=1002 group by id
ROOT.GetGridCapacity1: SELECT P.CONNECTIVE_PG_ID,S.CAPACITY FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_S S JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_B P ON S.ID=P.ID WHERE P.PLANT_TYPE=1002 AND P.OPERATE_STATE=1003
ROOT.GetRunoffresvInData: SELECT rr.ID,rr.NAME,v0.VALUE/v1.VALUE as v,rr.river_id,rr.province,rb.name FROM ys_db.YSH_RUNOFFRESV_R_DCC rr LEFT JOIN ( SELECT r.ID,AVG(f.MEAS_VALUE) AS VALUE FROM ys_db.YSH_RUNOFFRESV_R_DCC r JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_h_flood_2021 f on r.id=f.id WHERE r.important=1 and DATE>='{0}' AND DATE<'{1}' AND f.MEAS_TYPE='00001016' GROUP BY r.ID ) v0 ON rr.id=v0.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT r.ID,AVG(f.MEAS_VALUE) AS VALUE FROM ys_db.YSH_RUNOFFRESV_R_DCC r JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_h_flood_2021 f on r.id=f.id WHERE r.important=1 and DATE>='{2}' AND DATE<'{3}' AND f.MEAS_TYPE='00001016' GROUP BY r.ID ) v1 ON rr.id=v1.id left join sg_com_river_b rb on rr.river_id=rb.id where rr.important=1 order by rr.dcc_order
ROOT.GetZdZhuangji: SELECT S.ID,S.CAPACITY/10 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_S S JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_B P ON S.ID=P.ID WHERE P.PLANT_TYPE=1002 AND P.OPERATE_STATE=1003 AND P.DCC_ID='0021990100' AND S.VOLTAGE_TYPE=9999 AND S.STATE_CODE=1003 AND S.CAPACITY IS NOT NULL
ROOT.GetRid: SELECT RTYPE,RID,RID_P FROM YS_DB.YSH_RUNOFFRESV_R_DCC WHERE ID={0}
ROOT.temp: 0021990100 国家电力调度控制中心 0021990101 华北电力调度控制分中心 0021990102 华东电力调度控制分中心 0021990103 华中电力调度控制分中心 0021990104 东北电力调度控制分中心 0021990105 西北电力调度控制分中心 0021990106 西南电力调度控制分中心
